Title: What We Left Behind
Description:
He just... handed me the kingdom.

Me!

This is going to take a bit to process. But... look, $n. I know my father's a strong man, but there are times he holds himself so rigid that I fear he'll break. I'm not about to coddle him, but if you could just follow along, make sure he's all right? Soothe a daughter's heart? 

A queen's heart?
ObjectivesText: Follow King Greymane and keep an eye on him.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Follow King Greymane to Aderic's Repose.
